name: Draven
title: the Glorious Executioner
lore: In Noxus, warriors known as Reckoners face one another in arenas where blood is spilled and strength tested—but none has ever been as celebrated as Draven. A former soldier, he found that the crowds uniquely appreciated his flair for the dramatic, and his unparalleled skill with his spinning axes. Addicted to the spectacle of his own brash perfection, Draven has sworn to defeat whomever he must to ensure that his name is chanted throughout the empire forever more.
blurb: In Noxus, warriors known as Reckoners face one another in arenas where blood is spilled and strength tested—but none has ever been as celebrated as Draven. A former soldier, he found that the crowds uniquely appreciated his flair for the dramatic, and...
allytips: If Draven doesn't move, Spinning Axe will fall near his present location. It will fall directly on him, or just to the right or left.
If Draven does move after attacking, Spinning Axe will lead him in the direction of his movement. Use this to control where the Spinning Axe will go.
enemytips: Launch skillshots toward the landing position of Draven's Spinning Axes.
Disrupt Draven with the goal of making him drop his axes. If you do, his power drops dramatically.

riot_spells.name: Spinning Axe
riot_spells.description: Draven's next attack will deal bonus physical damage. This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe. Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Draven's next attack will deal {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage. The bonus is equal to {{ e5 }} plus {{ e2 }}% of his bonus Attack Damage.

This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe.

Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.

riot_spells.name: Blood Rush
riot_spells.description: Draven gains increased Movement Speed and Attack Speed. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Draven gains {{ e2 }}% increased Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds and {{ e4 }}% increased Attack Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration.

Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.

riot_spells.name: Stand Aside
riot_spells.description: Draven throws his axes, dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed.
riot_spells.tooltip: Draven throws his axes, dealing {{ e1 }} <scaleAD>(+{{ f1 }})</scaleAD> physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

riot_spells.name: Whirling Death
riot_spells.description: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Draven hurls two massive axes to deal {{ rcalculateddamage }} physical damage to each unit struck.

Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals {{ rdamagereductionperhit*100 }}% less damage for each unit hit (Minimum {{ rmindamagepercent }}%) and resets when the axes reverse direction.

riot_passive.name: League of Draven
riot_passive.description: Draven gains his fans' Adoration when he catches a Spinning Axe or kills a minion, monster, or tower. Killing enemy champions grants Draven bonus gold based on how much Adoration he has.

i1.name: League of Draven
i1.blurb: Draven gains his fans' Adoration when he catches a Spinning Axe or kills a minion, monster, or tower. Killing enemy champions grants Draven bonus gold based on how much Adoration he has.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} When '''Draven''' catches a {{ai|Spinning Axe|Draven}}, kills a non-champion or destroys a [[turret]], he gains a stack of ''Adoration''.
i1.description2: In addition, killing a minion or [[champion summoned units|champion summoned unit]] grants a ''{{ai|Strike}}'' stack for 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 6. If he drops an {{ai|Spinning Axe||axe}} he loses all ''Strike'' stacks. At 6 stacks, he consumes all of his ''Strike'' stacks and gains 2 ''Adoration'' stacks.
i1.description3: When '''Draven''' kills an enemy champion, he consumes all of his ''Adoration'' stacks and gains {{g|25 + (2{{times}}stacks) '''bonus''' gold}}.
i1.description4: '''Draven''' loses 75% of his ''Adoration'' stacks upon death.
i1.notes:
* '''Draven''' will gain {{ai|League of Draven||Adoration}} on [[ward]], [[trap]] and [[champion summoned units|summoned units]] kills.
* Assists from {{ai|Death from Below|Pyke}} will trigger ''League of Draven''.
* Upon reaching 150 {{ai|League of Draven||Adoration}} stacks, and every 100 stacks thereafter, as well as when he cashes at least 150 stacks in, Draven automatically sends a chat message notifying his team.
* A chat message will display to all players how much gold Draven has gained whenever ''League of Draven'' grants over {{g|300 gold}}.
** A chat message will display to the enemy how much gold Draven could've gained whenever ''League of Draven'' gets reduced.
* None of the parts of ''League of Draven'' require actually using a {{ai|Spinning Axe|Draven}} for a kill to get {{ai|Strike}} or {{ai|League of Draven||Adoration}} stacks, as well as to cash {{ai|League of Draven||Adoration}} stacks.

q1.name: Spinning Axe
q1.blurb: Draven's next attack will deal bonus physical damage. This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe. Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Draven''' starts spinning his axe, causing his next [[basic attack]] within {{fd|5.8}} seconds to deal {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}}.
q1.description2: The spinning axe ricochets off the target high up into the air, landing 2 seconds later at a location determined by '''Draven's''' current movement. If '''Draven''' catches an axe, ''Spinning Axe'' is reapplied for no additional cost on his next basic attack.
q1.description3: '''Draven''' can hold up to two ''Spinning Axes'' in his hands at once.
q1.notes:
* The landing location is determined by Draven's movement speed and direction at the time ''Spinning Axe'' hits the target. If '''Draven''' is actually moving, it will bounce directly into his path. Otherwise, it will bounce back towards his current location, either landing directly onto him or to his sides.
* '''Spinning Axe''' will place a visual cue on the ground where it will land. This visual cue is visible to both player teams, although '''Draven''' himself will see a more prominent marker.
* Recasting '''Spinning Axe''' will refresh the buff and add another axe if possible.
** There is no limit to how many axes can be juggled at once, as long as two are carried at a time.
* '''Draven''' can also catch an enemy's '''Draven''' axe.
* '''Spinning Axes''' may optically bypass {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} but will be destroyed upon impact.
* {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} will block the attack, but the axe will bounce off normally.
* The triggering attack will apply [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
** As with most on-hit physical damage the bonus damage from ''Spinning Axe'' will apply {{sti|life steal}}.
** {{tip|critical strike|Critical strikes}} will not interact with ''Spinning Axe's'' bonus damage.
** Attacks against structures will refresh the timer on active ''Spinning Axes'', but no other effects.
** The damage will be negated if the attack is {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Spirit's Refuge|Shen|blocked}}, or if it {{tip|blind|misses}}. The axe will still bounce off.
** {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} {{nie|Wind's Fury}} will not trigger the bonus damage or spawn extra axes.

w1.name: Blood Rush
w1.blurb: Draven gains increased Movement Speed and Attack Speed. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Draven''' becomes {{tip|ghosted}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, gaining {{sti|as|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 3 seconds and {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} which decays over 1.5 seconds.
w1.notes: * Activating ''Blood Rush'' while the effect is already active will refresh the bonus stats.

e1.name: Stand Aside
e1.blurb: Draven throws his axes, dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Draven''' throws his axes in a line, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies hit, {{tip|airborne|knocking them aside}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds.

r1.name: Whirling Death
r1.blurb: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Draven''' hurls two [[File:Whirling Death Minimap.png|24px]] massive axes in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies struck.
r1.description2: Upon reaching the edge of the map, striking an enemy champion, or upon reactivation, the axes slowly come to a stop before changing direction and returning to '''Draven''', dealing the same damage to every enemy struck on the way back.
r1.description3: ''Whirling Death'' deals {{pp|9|type=enemy hit|key=%|100 to 44;40|0 to 8|displayformula=100% - (8% per enemy hit). ''This is capped at 40% damage.''}} damage, this reduction resets when the axes reverse direction.
r1.leveling3: {{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|70|110|150}} {{as|(+ 44% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Minimum Total Damage|{{ap|140|220|300}} {{as|(+ 88% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
r1.notes:
* ''Whirling Death'' grants {{tip|sight}} along its path. 
* 'Changing direction' does not occur instantly but rather the axes will decelerate and come to a complete halt before turning around.
** With careful timing, it is possible to reactivate the ability and cause an enemy to instantly take two passes of damage.
* If Draven dies while the axes are cast, they will fizzle upon the next interaction.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block one instance of damage.
